CHAT.comment: at the start of the recording June and her mother are playing with a doll.

u.a: no response , silence , June is holding a cube .
June is playing with the shapesorter .
silence , June tips out all the shapes and giggles .
June is playing with the shapes outside the line of the camera . silence .
mother covers a doll which is on the floor with a blanket .
June holds the doll by the feet
silence during which June covers the doll with the sheet
mother hands a cloth book to Jun
June covers the doll with the cloth book
mother points to a picture in the book
June points to the wrong picture
June points to the correct picture
June points to the wrong picture again
June points to the correct picture again
June points to a picture of a pear , the pear is the same color as her ball
June points to the same picture again
June throws off the cover to reveal the doll
June plays with the doll's lips
silence , mother shows June a shoe
June digs in the toybox and produces her ball .
mother shows her a stuffed rabbit .
mother places great emphasis on the length of the nasal
turns June to the camera and continues searching in the toybox
June begins to rummage in the toybox , mother holds up a toy duck .
pulls a book out of the toybox
this is the first time on record that June has substituted read for puttaputta@c , also note that the labialization of U . is not fully completed .
the labialization of U . is not fully completed .
June turns to look at the other books stacked on the bookshelf .
June hands a book to her mother .
points to picture in the book
points to the picture of Gipetto
points to the picture of the cat
silence during which June looks at the picture .
points to the picture of Gipetto
points again but June misidentifies the picture
June moves up and looks at the people in the book .
June picks up a different book
June walks away and gets another book
June hands the second book to her mother
points to a picture in the book
the labilaization of U is not fully completed .
June turns to the camera , smiles and turns back to her mother
points to a picture in the book
June and her mother start to look in the toybox .
mother pulls out a toy phone .
June was facing away from the camera .
the labialization of U is not fully completed .
the labialization of U is not fully completed .
the labialization of U is not fully completed .
mother is turning back through the book .
mother pauses to see if June will speak .
the labialization of U is not fully completed .
mother gets a different book , she gets Snow White and opens it to a picture of the Seven Dwarves .
June looks at the new book .
June sings her version of the dwarves' song .
June hands a toy to her mother
June looks at a picture of a baby in the book .
June looks at the book . silence .
very loud with the final syllable even louder .
June turns to her mother , mother points to a picture in the Pinnochio book and June looks at it .
points to the feet in the picture .
points to the snow white book
mother gets the train book from the bookshelf .
June goes to the bookshelf again and mother helps her to get a book .
silence , June returns to the bookshelf , mother assists her .
mother reads the seashore book to June .
June is looking at the book .
June takes her mother's hand and gives her the book .
mother gets a toy parrot out of the toybox . silence .
mother squishes the parrot in June's face .
gets a soft toy chicken out of the toybox
no response , silence during which June drops the parrot and approaches the microphone , mother holds up a birthday card .
mother gets a book with a picture of a sheep on the cover .
turns to a picture of a swan
mother picks up a toy phone and hands it to June .
June begins to look in the toybox .
June picks a yellow plastic disk out of the toybox .
June takes the brush and begins to brush her own hair .
mother picks up the brush and the doll , June takes the brush .
June brushes the doll's hair roughly .
June puts down the brush and begins to arrange the doll's hair by hand .
June drops the doll and returns to playing with the plastic disk .
June removes a cover from the plastic disk .
then she replaces the cover on the disk .
June hands the disk to her mother .
mother ignores the disk and hands the birthday card to June again .
June throws the card aside again , she is still holding the disk .
mother tries again with a third book .
mother tries again with the same result .
mother chooses another book and tries again .
June very pointedly tosses the book away and then hits her mother .
June tries to put the book into the shapesorter .
silence during which June puts the book aside and begins to tip the shapes out of the shapesorter .
June starts putting the shapes into the shapesorter , mother hands her one .
mother hands a shape to June and tries to get her to put it through a hole instead of through the lid .
June tries to put it through a hole .
then June drops it through the lid .
then she drops the shape through the lid . June can't get it through a hole .
June puts it through the lid , mother hands her another shape .
June puts it through the lid
mother begins to stack up the stacking blocks .
June takes the block from her mother and throws it away
finds another shape for the shapesorter and hands it to June .
mother hands a second shape to June .
mother builds a tower with the stacking blocks , she holds out a block to June
begins to stack blocks on the shapesorter
June takes a thin block and puts it through one of the shapesorter's holes .
June gets another block and puts it through a hole into the shapesorter .
silence during which June pops another block into the shapesorter .
silence during which June stacks up two blocks and then she and her mother play with the stacking blocks .
mother removes the blocks from the top of the shapesorter and gets the blocks from inside it .
June looks at the jigsaw , June removes a piece of the jigsaw .
no response , June tries to place the piece the wrong way round .
mother takes off her wristwatch and gives it to June .
June puts the watch on her wrist .
mother turns June to face the camera .
